segments.text: In the kitchen, there's an adult woman facing the sink area.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She holds a plate and a dish towel, wiping it clean.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The faucet runs steadily into the full basin.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water overflows gently over the edge.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A puddle forms on the tile floor beneath.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Nearby, a boy stands on a step stool before the cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He reaches one arm into the open cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: With his other hand, he balances a plate awkwardly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A girl stands beside him, her hand extended upward.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Through the window, a garden path is visible with bushes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Curtains are pulled back from the panes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Dishes stack neatly on the counter to the right.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The overall setup shows a typical household moment.
segments.speaker: PAR
